name: papercut
description: A desktop utility for installing Kindle jailbreaks, hotfixes, and other mods.

scripts.build-mac: npm i && neu update && brew install jq || sudo apt-get install jq && sh ./build-mac.sh
scripts.build-linux: npm i && neu update && brew install jq || sudo apt-get install jq && sh ./build-linux.sh
scripts.build-win: npm i && neu update && brew install jq || sudo apt-get install jq && sh ./build-win.sh
